title: Letter Counter
description: Accurately counts the number of characters and words in text
footer: All calculations are performed in the browser and are not sent to the server. Your input text is processed locally only, so it can be used safely.
fileDesc_main_tsx: React app entry point file (main code to run the app)
fileDesc_App_tsx: Main application component (defines overall app structure)
fileDesc_chunk_js: JavaScript files automatically split by webpack (divides large files into smaller pieces for performance optimization)
fileDesc_1: Test request or error response (no data)
fileDesc_es_js: ES module bundle file (JavaScript module optimization)
fileDesc_vite_chunk_js: Code-split JavaScript file automatically generated by Vite
fileDesc_cloudflare_analytics: Cloudflare web analytics request (usage overview, visit count only)
fileDesc_cloudflare_rum: Cloudflare site performance measurement request (for improving loading speed, measuring speed only)
unknownFileToastDesc: A file requiring security review has been found

footerInfo.safetyBody:
This site does not send the text you enter to any server.

All character counting and analysis are performed entirely within your browser, and the text you enter is neither transmitted nor stored externally.

The network monitor displayed on the right shows, in real time, how this site communicates with your browser.

This is the same information you can see by opening the Network tab in your browser’s developer tools (such as Chrome or Safari).

All scripts and files loaded by this site are recorded both in the network monitor and in the browser’s Network tab.

For example, when you click the download button, a request named "1" appears, and when you click the upload button, a request named "posts" appears in both places.

On the other hand, entering text into the “Text to analyze” input does not generate any network requests.

This allows you to verify for yourself that the text you enter is not sent to a server.

※ Minimal network communication required for page delivery and performance measurement (such as RUM) does exist, but the content of the text you enter is not transmitted to any server.

※ This site is not a security tool and is intended for use in a general web environment.

※ This explanation describes the current behavior of the site and may vary depending on the browser environment.
footerInfo.adsBody:
We live in a time when many people have a lot to write.

Whether you are a student, at work, or using the site quickly in public, we did not want unnecessary or awkward advertisements to make the experience uncomfortable.

Because I personally care a great deal about advertising and personal data, and because I felt the need for a tool like this myself, I decided to build it.

I hope you can use it comfortably, anytime.
